1048450.name: Probably Nothing
1048450.description:
In Probably Nothing, you're just an ordinary streamer who's been whisked away from their gaming setup to... somewhere else entirely! As you explore this strange new world, discover that your home has been replaced by a wacky labrynth filled with cryptic clues and hidden passages.

Key Features:

  • Explore a vast underground labrynth with multiple paths and secrets

  • Gather resources (food, water, materials) to survive on a small island surrounded by majestic mountains

  • Craft tools and shelter using gathered materials

  • Encounter quirky creatures that will try to make you their next meal (but don't worry, they're more silly than scary!)

  • Discover ancient ruins and mysterious portals leading to distant lands filled with treasures and surprises

  • Uncover the truth behind your abduction and find a way back home
1048450.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
